visual.name: BIBookPlanning
visual.description: The BI Book Planning visual enhances Power BI reporting by enabling users to input, edit, and update data directly within the platform. This feature allows for real-time financial planning, where forecasts and budgets can be adjusted instantly. It streamlines collaboration by allowing team members to update figures in a single report and supports scenario modeling for “what-if” analyses without altering the main dataset. This visual provides its users with accuracy through real-time updates, efficiency by simplifying processes, and informed decision-making with immediate access to data.
